verses.name: Judges 3:24
verses.text: When he was gone out, his servants came; and when they saw that, behold, the doors of the parlour were locked, they said, Surely he covereth his feet in his summer chamber.

verses.name: Judges 3:25
verses.text: And they tarried till they were ashamed: and, behold, he opened not the doors of the parlour; therefore they took a key, and opened them: and, behold, their lord was fallen down dead on the earth.

verses.name: Judges 3:26
verses.text: And Ehud escaped while they tarried, and passed beyond the quarries, and escaped unto Seirath.
